sentences.english: In the period of KMT ruled, the Trade Association was basal structure of the chamber of commerce.
sentences.chinese: 在国民党统治时期，同业公会是商会的基层组织。

sentences.english: Document evidencing membership in the SITCA;
sentences.chinese: 同业公会同意入会之证明文件。

sentences.english: I belong to a guild of wine butlers.
sentences.chinese: 我属于主管酒类的男仆同业公会。

sentences.english: To better illustrate, the functioning of the Association of Stone-Processing Industry at ChongWu was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 为更好地说明，对崇武石材同业公会进行了简单介绍。

sentences.english: A securities brokers acting as a master agent under paragraph 1 shall join the SITCA.
sentences.chinese: 第一项担任总代理人之证券经纪商，应加入同业公会。

sentences.english: Draw out the draft of articles for industrial board of trade.
sentences.chinese: 拟订工业同业公会章程草案。
